remarks:
An unordered pair belongs to the power class of a class iff each member belongs to the class.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.)  (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)

 An unordered pair belongs to the power class of a class iff each member belongs to the class.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
